revised_title: The Salubrity of Sea Air and Its Impact on Health
tldr: John Ingen Housz conducted experiments to compare the salubrity of air at sea with that of the sea-shore and places far from the sea. He found that sea air had a superior purity to common air, which may explain the health benefits often associated with sea voyages. The author also observed that frosty weather may contribute to purifying the atmosphere.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Atmospheric Science
